segments.text: I look at that ‘COOKIE JAR’ label and wonder how many cookies are really in there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s funny how something so simple can bring about such chaos in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, my heart sinks a little as I see the boy's confidence; he really thinks he can manage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, but balancing on that stool? It’s a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself smiling at the girl’s hopeful expression; she believes in her brother’s ability to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, that does nothing to alleviate the anxiety gnawing at me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only hope the woman takes a moment to notice what’s brewing before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
